summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from February 1, 2015, to February 28, 2015. It includes various debits and credits, primarily related to tax payments and other service charges, indicating the financial activities during that period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 573 Lexington Ave, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account over the month of February 2015.
The ending balance as of February 28, 2015, was $46,421.13.
Numerous preauthorized debits were made for tax payments and service charges throughout the month.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in transactions within specified time frames.
There are multiple references to ADP for tax and payroll services, indicating regular payroll processing.
